title: Cardamom, pistachio and coffee Swiss roll
description: This is a really classy Swiss roll combining the grown-up flavours of dark chocolate, pistachio, cardamom and coffee.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a piping bag and an acetate sheet.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz caster sugar, plus extra for dusting
caster sugar, to sprinkle on the baking parchment
1 tsp instant coffee, dissolved in 1 tbsp hot water
